item.title: Open Windows Terminal here
item.description: The new Windows terminal (wt.exe) is very useful. At the moment i use it as my default terminal. It annoys me that there is currently no official way to start it directly from the right click context menu. So I want to show you how I solved this problem for me.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: For a long time I have been thinking about how I can store and share my knowledge. Finally I decided to start this blog. After further weeks of researching which framework would be the best for me, I decided to use the static code generator HUGO and host the blog on Github Pages.
